Room.Name: Dis
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the northeastern citadel of the second plane of Hell, Dis.
Room.LongDescription: Dis is almost like a city in itself, dominated by four large citadels at each cardinal point of the compass. At the center of everything is Dispater himself, afterwhich this realm was named. The powerful devil will do anything to prevent you from reaching him, including sending out some very dangerous and deadly minions to destroy you.
